$schema: Custom thresholds configuration for Web Audit Suite
$comment: Copy this file to custom-thresholds.json and adjust values for your requirements

loadTime.$comment: Page load time in milliseconds. Pass: excellent (<3s), Warn: acceptable (<5s)

lcp.$comment: Largest Contentful Paint in milliseconds. Based on Core Web Vitals: Good (<2.5s), Needs Improvement (<4s)

fcp.$comment: First Contentful Paint in milliseconds. Good (<1.8s), Needs Improvement (<3s)

cls.$comment: Cumulative Layout Shift score. Good (<0.1), Needs Improvement (<0.25). Scale: 0-1

tti.$comment: Time to Interactive in milliseconds. Fast (<3.8s), Moderate (<7.3s)

maxErrors.$comment: Maximum WCAG error count. Pass: zero errors, Warn: up to 5 errors

maxWarnings.$comment: Maximum WCAG warning count. Pass: up to 10, Warn: up to 30

maxTotalIssues.$comment: Maximum total accessibility issues (errors + warnings + notices)

minTitleLength.$comment: Minimum title tag length in characters. Google typically shows 50-60 characters

maxTitleLength.$comment: Maximum title tag length in characters. Longer titles may be truncated in search results

minMetaDescLength.$comment: Minimum meta description length in characters. Google typically shows 120-156 characters

maxMetaDescLength.$comment: Maximum meta description length in characters. Longer descriptions may be truncated

minWordCount.$comment: Minimum word count for quality content. Pass: 300+ words, Warn: 150+ words

minHeadings.$comment: Minimum heading count for structured content. Pass: 3+ headings, Warn: 1+ heading

minServedScore.$comment: Minimum LLM suitability score for served HTML (0-100). Critical for all AI agents including CLI agents

minRenderedScore.$comment: Minimum LLM suitability score for rendered HTML (0-100). Important for browser-based AI agents
